Ability: Remember who you were by selecting a graveyard role.

Attributes: When you choose a role it will be revealed to the town.

Goal: Remember who you were and complete that roles objectives. You can also survive at the end to win, like the Survivor.

Note(s):
-You may select a graveyard role who has been cleaned by the Janitor.
-You cannot select a graveyard role that is Unique.
-If you get doused, then the arsonist dies and you remember you are an arsonist, you will die when you ignite yourself.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target does not remember their role. They must be an Amnesiac.
Consigliere - Your target does not remember their role. They must be an Amnesiac.

Win Conditions:
N/A

Abilities: Put on a bulletproof vest at night, protecting yourself from attacks.

Attributes:
-You can only use the bulletproof vest 4 times. (BUG: Sometimes, you cannot remove your vest once it has been worn).
-When you have a vest on, you cannot die (excluding the Arsonist\'s ignite, Jailor\'s execution, and Jester\'s haunt).
-Even if you are not attacked, your vest will get destroyed.

Goal: Live to the end of the game.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target is a loner. They are either a Witch or Survivor.
Consigliere - Your target simply wants to live. They must be a Survivor.

Win Conditions:
Win with Town
Win with Serial Killers
Win with Arsonists
Win with Mafia
Win with Witchs
Win with Survivors
